DATA:
  x 0
  y 0
  res 0
  i 0

CODE:
  MOV A,21 ;100011000000000000000000000000010101
  MOV (x),A ;001000000010000000000000000000000000
  MOV A,5 ;100011000000000000000000000000000101
  MOV (y),A ;001000000010000000000000000000000001
  MOV A,0 ;100011000000000000000000000000000000
  MOV (res),A ;001000000010000000000000000000000010
  MOV (i),A ;001000000010000000000000000000000011
  MOV A,(x) ;100010000000000000000000000000000000
  CMP A,0  ;001011001000000000000000000000000000
  JEQ end ;000000000101000000000000000000011011
  
  MOV A,(y) ;100010000000000000000000000000000001
  CMP A,0 ;001011001000000000000000000000000000
  JEQ end ;000000000101000000000000000000011011
  
    start:
    MOV A,(res) ;100010000000000000000000000000000010
    ADD A,(y) ;101010000000000000000000000000000001
    MOV (res),A  ;001000000010000000000000000000000010
    MOV A,(i) ;100010000000000000000000000000000011
    ADD A,1 ;101011000000000000000000000000000001
    MOV (i),A ;001000000010000000000000000000000011
    MOV B,(x) ;010010000000000000000000000000000000
    CMP A,B ;001001001000000000000000000000000000
    JNE start ;000000000100100000000000000000001101
    MOV B,(res) ;010010000000000000000000000000000010

end:
JMP end ;000000000100000000000000000000010111
